short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert selected webpage text to audio and listen seamlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Detailed Description:

ReadMe is your perfect companion for browsing the web. This simple yet powerful Chrome extension allows you to convert any selected text on a webpage into audio. Whether you want to listen to an interesting article, follow along with a recipe, or simply need assistance reading, ReadMe is here to help.

Key Features:

Text to Speech: Easily convert any selected text on a webpage into audio. Just select the text, right-click, and choose "Read selected text."
Control Playback: Start and stop reading with a single click. The extension remembers where you left off, so you can resume from the same spot.
User-Friendly: Simple and intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to use. The button text updates to show the current state ("Start Reading" or "Stop Reading").
Customizable: Adjust the speech rate and pitch through the options page for a personalized listening experience.
ReadMe enhances your web browsing experience by adding audio capabilities to your favorite websites. It is especially useful for multitasking, improving accessibility, and for those who prefer listening over reading.

Try ReadMe today and transform your browsing experience with the power of text-to-speech!
